metadata.title: Admin dashboard
metadata.description: Admin Dashboard for managing users, frameworks, and projects

AdminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
AdminDashboard.subtitle: Manage your users, frameworks, and projects from a single interface
AdminDashboard.errorFetchingData: Error fetching data. Tap to retry.

UserManagement.subheading: Create, manage, and monitor user accounts across your organization.
UserManagement.name: Name
UserManagement.noUsersDescription: There are no users matching your criteria. Try adjusting your filters or add a new user.
UserManagement.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
UserManagement.deleteUserWarning: This action cannot be undone. The user will lose access to all assigned projects.
UserManagement.FailedToFetchUsers: Failed to fetch users. Please try again.
UserManagement.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.
UserManagement.errorRecentLoginRequired: For security reasons, you need to log in again before performing this action. Please log out and log back in, then try again.
UserManagement.emailAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists. Please use a different email address.
UserManagement.createAndManageUsers: Create and manage users, assign to organizations, and track progress.

UserForm.addUserDescription: Create a new user account with specific roles and permissions
UserForm.editUserDescription: Update details and permissions for the selected user
UserForm.name: Name
UserForm.leaveEmptyToKeep: Leave empty to keep current password
UserForm.userCreatedDescription: {name} has been added to your organization. They can now login with the provided credentials.
UserForm.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.passwordRequiresUppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordRequiresNumber: Password must include at least one number

OrganizationManagement.organizationManagementDescription: Create and manage organizations, assign projects, and track organization activities.
OrganizationManagement.noOrganizationsDescription: Start by adding your first organization to the system.
OrganizationManagement.deleteOrganizationWarning: This action cannot be undone. All data associated with this organization will be permanently deleted.
OrganizationManagement.fetchErrorDescription: There was an error retrieving organizations. Please try again later.
OrganizationManagement.formErrorDescription: There was an error submitting the form. Please check your inputs and try again.
OrganizationManagement.deleteErrorDescription: There was an error deleting the organization. Please try again later.

OrganizationForm.addOrganizationDescription: Create a new organization and assign projects to it.
OrganizationForm.editOrganizationDescription: Modify organization details and project assignments.
OrganizationForm.organizationCreatedDescription: The organization has been created successfully.
OrganizationForm.organizationUpdatedDescription: The organization has been updated successfully.

validation.requiredEnglishName: Organization name in English is required
validation.requiredArabicName: Organization name in Arabic is required

FrameworkForm.addFrameworkDescription: Create a new framework with descriptions in multiple languages

validation.requiredEnglishDescription: Framework description in English is required
validation.requiredDescription: Description is required for this language

FrameworkManagement.frameworkManagementDescription: Create and manage frameworks for your organization
FrameworkManagement.noFrameworksDescription: Start by adding your first framework to the system
FrameworkManagement.deleteFrameworkWarning: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this framework?
FrameworkManagement.fetchErrorDescription: There was an error retrieving frameworks. Please try again later.
FrameworkManagement.formErrorDescription: There was an error submitting the form. Please check your inputs and try again.
FrameworkManagement.deleteErrorDescription: There was an error deleting the framework. Please try again later.
FrameworkManagement.frameworkAddingSoon: Adding new frameworks will be available soon...
FrameworkManagement.npcAssessmentDescription: Define how the NPC framework will be assessed.
FrameworkManagement.noAssessmentDescription: There are no assessment criteria defined yet. Create criteria to define how this framework will be assessed.
FrameworkManagement.frameworkAssessmentDescription: Define how the {framework} framework will be assessed and evaluated.
FrameworkManagement.domainManagementDescription: Create and manage domains belonging to this framework
FrameworkManagement.noDomainsDescription: Start by adding your first domain to this framework
FrameworkManagement.createFirstDomain: Start by creating your first domain for this framework
FrameworkManagement.noDomainsMatchSearch: No domains match your search criteria
FrameworkManagement.domainDetailsDescription: View and manage details for this domain
FrameworkManagement.deleteDomainWarning: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this domain?
FrameworkManagement.errorOccurredDuringFetch: An error occurred while retrieving domains. Please try again.
FrameworkManagement.frameworkDescription: Manage domains and components for the {framework} framework.

DomainForm.addDomainDescription: Create a new domain with descriptions in multiple languages

SpecificationManagement.title: Specification Management

Auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your account
Auth.accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact your administrator.
Auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
Auth.serverError: Incorrect Email or Password. Please Contact your administrator.

dashboard.title: Welcome to the Dashboard
dashboard.content: This is your main dashboard where you can monitor all activities.

dashboard-hero.title: Admin Dashboard Overview
dashboard-hero.content: This is your main dashboard section showing key information and metrics.

dashboard-actions.title: Quick Actions
dashboard-actions.content: Use these action buttons to navigate to frequently used functions.

dashboard-summary.title: Key Metrics
dashboard-summary.content: View important statistics and metrics about your system at a glance.

dashboard-charts.title: Data Visualization
dashboard-charts.content: These charts provide visual representation of your data and key metrics.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.content: Create, edit, and manage user accounts from this section.

projectsView.title: Projects Overview
projectsView.content: View and manage all your projects in one place.

addButton.title: Add New Items
addButton.content: Use this button to create new users, projects, or frameworks.

profileSection.title: Profile Settings
profileSection.content: Access your profile settings and preferences here.

home.title: Home Dashboard
home.content: Your central hub for monitoring all activities and key metrics.

nav-home.title: Home
nav-home.content: View your main dashboard with key metrics and important notifications.

nav-user-management.title: User Management
nav-user-management.content: Create, edit, deactivate accounts and manage user permissions.

nav-framework-management.title: Framework Management
nav-framework-management.content: Create and configure frameworks that structure your organization's processes.

nav-project-management.title: Project Management
nav-project-management.content: Create and track projects, assign teams, and monitor progress.

nav-organization-management.title: Organization Management
nav-organization-management.content: Manage multiple organizations and their hierarchical structures.

languageSwitcher.title: Language Options
languageSwitcher.content: Switch between English and Arabic to use the application in your preferred language.

logout.title: Logout
logout.content: Click here to securely log out of your account.

users-page-overview.title: User Management Overview
users-page-overview.content: This is where you manage user accounts across your organization. You can create, edit, and delete users from this page.

users-search-filter.title: Search and Filter Users
users-search-filter.content: Use these tools to quickly find specific users by name, email, role, or status.

users-add-user.title: Add New Users
users-add-user.content: Click this button to create new user accounts with specific roles and permissions.

users-status-toggle.title: User Status Management
users-status-toggle.content: Important: When a user's status is set to 'Inactive', they will not be able to log in to the system. Use this to temporarily disable access without deleting the account.

users-actions.title: User Actions
users-actions.content: Edit user details or delete users using these action buttons.

ProjectManagement.projectManagementDescription: Create and manage projects, assign to organizations, and track progress.
ProjectManagement.noProjectsDescription: Start by adding your first project to the system.
ProjectManagement.deleteProjectWarning: This action cannot be undone. All data associated with this project will be permanently deleted.
ProjectManagement.fetchErrorDescription: There was an error retrieving projects. Please try again later.
ProjectManagement.formErrorDescription: There was an error submitting the form. Please check your inputs and try again.
ProjectManagement.deleteErrorDescription: There was an error deleting the project. Please try again later.

ProjectForm.addProjectDescription: Create a new project with details and assignments.
ProjectForm.projectCreatedDescription: The project has been created successfully.
ProjectForm.projectUpdatedDescription: The project has been updated successfully.

validation.requiredEnglishName: Project name in English is required
validation.requiredArabicName: Project name in Arabic is required
validation.requiredEnglishDescription: Project description in English is required
validation.requiredArabicDescription: Project description in Arabic is required

noCriteria.title: No Assessment Criteria Defined
noCriteria.description: No assessment criteria have been defined yet. Create criteria to define how this framework will be assessed.

typeSelector.title: Select Assessment Criteria Type
typeSelector.description: Choose the type of assessment criteria that best fits your framework's evaluation requirements

percentage.title: Percentage Based
percentage.description: Evaluate based on simple percentage scores across domains

maturity.title: Maturity Levels
maturity.description: Evaluate using defined maturity levels (e.g., Initial, Managed, Optimized)

compliance.title: Compliance Based
compliance.description: Evaluate based on compliance status (e.g., Compliant, Partially Compliant, Non-Compliant)

description.maturity: Define the maturity levels that will be used to assess frameworks
description.compliance: Define the compliance levels that will be used to assess frameworks

domainWeight.title: Domain Weight Configuration
domainWeight.description: Assign weights to each domain to determine their importance in the overall assessment score
domainWeight.instruction: Adjust the sliders or enter values to set the weight of each domain. Total should equal 100%.

preview.title: Assessment Criteria Preview
preview.description: Review your assessment criteria configuration before saving

summary.title: Assessment Criteria Summary
summary.description: Overview of your assessment criteria configuration

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Assessment Criteria?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. All assessment criteria configuration will be permanently deleted.
